resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/70457</entry>
  </identifier>

    <entry>70457</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120577</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120577</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Valjna ali krogelna  simetrija?</string>
            <string language="en">Cylindrical or spherical symmetry?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zylinderförmige oder kugelförmige Symmetrie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Symétrie cylindrique ou sphérique ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simetria cilíndrica ou esférica?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simmetria cilindrica o sferica?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυλινδρική ή σφαιρική συμμετρία;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Simetría cilíndrica o esférica?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Z merjenjem potenciala v ravnini ugotovi ali gre za kroglo ali valj.</string>
            <string language="en">Determine if the unknown object is a sphere or a cylinder by measuring the electric potential.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni potencial</string>
            <string language="en">electric potential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie fest, wenn die unbekannte Nachricht ein 
Bereich oder ein Zylinder ist, indem sie das elektrische Potential 
mißt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez si l'objet inconnu est une sphère ou un 
cylindre en mesurant le potentiel électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine se o objeto desconhecido for uma esfera ou um 
cilindro medindo o potencial elétrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini se l'oggetto sconosciuto è una sfera o un 
cilindro misurando il potenziale elettrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε εάν το άγνωστο αντικείμενο είναι μια 
σφαίρα ή ένας κύλινδρος με τη μέτρηση της ηλεκτρικής 
δυνατότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determínese si el objeto desconocido es una esfera o un 
cilindro midiendo el potencial eléctrico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisches Potential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">potentiel électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">potencial elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">potenziale elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δυνατότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">potencial eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
